title: I.A.A.F. track and field events, Helsinki
creator_credit: Guy Butler and International Amateur Athletic Federation
brief_description: Documentary highlights of the diverse sectors of the Helsinki 1952 Olympic Games ranging from the Opening Ceremony to specific events, ie field, high jump, long jump. Shows respective winners at these events and the lead up to their victory. Silent film with English subtext.
creator_credit_for_label: Guy Butler and International Amateur Athletic Federation
